title: r/Entitledparents Waiter? SERVE ME OR I'LL GET YOU FIRED!
description:
r/Entitledparents In today's episode, OP goes on a date with his girlfriend and his would-be in-laws. He thought he was going to have a very normal dinner, but it turned into one of the worst experiences of his entire life. The mother-in-law is an absolute insane entitled Karen who harasses the waiter nonstop and even tries to steal food from another table! If you like this episode, follow for more daily Reddit content!
